backend/main.mo: Primary LandCanister actor defining land data types, user state maps, utilities, and core structures for gameplay logic.
CANISTER_REINSTALL_GUIDE.md: Instructions for force-reinstalling the Land and Asset canisters on IC mainnet and re-initializing them after backing up state.
DEPLOYMENT_CHECKLIST.md: High-level checklist outlining required environment setup and variables before deploying the app.
DEPLOYMENT_GUIDE.md: Mainnet deployment guide describing prerequisites and ordered steps for deploying all canisters and 3D assets.
DEPLOYMENT_INSTRUCTIONS.md: Brief deployment steps emphasizing correct canister deployment order and environment configuration.
DEVELOPER_README.md: Developer documentation describing the multi-canister architecture, components, and system overview of the CyberGenesis DApp.
ENVIRONMENT_CONFIGURATION.md: List of required frontend environment variables and network-related configuration.
ENVIRONMENT_SETUP.md: Setup guide for configuring environment variables and deploying canisters to resolve common initialization errors.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to required changes, affected files, components, and test references.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Generated summaries describing the purpose and behavior of various frontend files and components.
frontend/.env: Production environment variables for mainnet including canister IDs, admin principal, and stability settings.
frontend/.env.example: Template environment file showing required variable names, canister IDs, and optional debug settings.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading the root React application and disabling caching.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component controlling authentication, actor initialization, profile setup flow, and reinitialization UI states.
frontend/src/asset-backend.d.ts: TypeScript definitions for the asset backend canister including asset types, user profiles, roles, and all API method signatures.
frontend/src/asset-backend.idl.ts: Candid IDL factory defining the asset backend canister interface for asset management, access control, and user profile operations.
frontend/src/backend.idl.ts: Candid IDL factory for the main backend canister covering land data, rewards, loot cache, modifiers, and various admin and query functions.
frontend/src/components/AdminGLBUpload.t: Admin interface for uploading GLB land models with authorization checks, health checks, and upload progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin panel enabling GLB file uploads with asset canister health checks, file validation, and upload progress simulation.
frontend/src/components/AssetCanisterDia: Diagnostics tool running detailed tests on the asset canister including connectivity, permissions, asset queries, and cycle balances.
frontend/src/components/AssetCanisterRei: Provides a UI workflow to validate authorization, run pre/post checks, and execute asset‑canister reinitialization steps.
frontend/src/components/CanisterDiagnost: Runs health checks on canisters via multiple gateways and produces status reports with timing, failures, and recommendations.
frontend/src/components/CanisterIDVerifi: Displays configured canister IDs, compares them to expected values, and highlights mismatches.
Validates essential environment variables and shows blocking errors and warnings when configuration is incomplete.
frontend/src/components/CosmicBackground: Renders an animated 2D cosmic background with stars and nebula effects using a canvas.
frontend/src/components/CubeVisualizatio: 3D scene component rendering biome-specific models with custom shaders, lighting, and postprocessing effects.
frontend/src/components/CyberCube.tsx: Empty placeholder file exporting nothing after logic was moved elsewhere.
frontend/src/components/DeploymentVerifi: UI component that checks and displays health status of backend canisters using actors and periodic polling.
frontend/src/components/Discovery.tsx: Manages loot cache discovery and processing, interacting with backend actors and showing land, balance, and cache actions.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary that catches component errors and displays a styled fallback alert.
frontend/src/components/Governance.tsx: Implements staking, proposal creation, and voting UI using governance-related queries and mutations.
frontend/src/components/LandDashboard.ts: Displays land stats, handles reward claims, upgrades, modifiers, and admin debug actions with cooldown logic.
frontend/src/components/LandModel.tsx: Loads a GLTF land model with KTX2 textures, applies emissive and environment settings, and auto-fits the camera once loaded.
frontend/src/components/LandSelector.tsx: Provides UI to navigate between land entries, showing plot name, biome and index with previous/next buttons.
frontend/src/components/Leaderboard.tsx: Displays a top‑10 leaderboard of lands with loading, error handling, and token balance formatting.
frontend/src/components/MapView.tsx: Renders an interactive pannable/zoomable world map on canvas, positioning the view based on the user’s land coordinates.
frontend/src/components/Marketplace.tsx: Implements marketplace UI with listing filters, buy/list/cancel actions, and dialogs for managing land/modifier listings.
Empty component placeholder with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/components/NetworkDiagnosti: Runs periodic health checks against the asset canister and displays connection status, latency, and uptime with expandable details.
frontend/src/components/ParticleBackgrou: Canvas-based particle animation with colored particles and connecting lines, including resize handling and animation cleanup.
frontend/src/components/PlotCustomizatio: UI for editing a land plot's name and decoration URL using mutation hooks and form inputs.
frontend/src/components/PlugWalletButton: Wallet connect button that shows Plug wallet status, allows copying principal, and supports disconnecting.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Profile setup form that saves a user's name via mutation and displays toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/Reinitialization: Fullscreen overlay showing connection retry progress, gateway info, and a loading indicator.
frontend/src/components/ThreeErrorBounda: Error boundary that catches 3D rendering errors, logs details, and shows a resettable fallback UI.
frontend/src/config/mainnet.ts: Mainnet configuration for canister IDs, URLs, feature flags, and helpers for validating and generating model URLs.
Provides React context for Plug wallet connection, tracking principal, status, and actor creation.
frontend/src/data/modifierCatalog.ts: Exports a static list of placeholder modifier items with ids, names, rarity tiers, and asset URLs.
frontend/src/governance-backend.d.ts: TypeScript definitions for governance backend interfaces, proposals, votes, and result variants.
frontend/src/governance-backend.idl.ts: Defines the Candid IDL for the governance backend service including proposal, vote, and staking methods.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches a backend actor based on user identity and invalidates dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorReinitializer: Hook that attempts automatic actor reinitialization with gateway rotation and retry logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithInit.ts: Enhanced actor hook that performs initialization checks, polling, and connectivity validation before use.
frontend/src/hooks/useAssetActor.ts: Initializes an asset canister actor with environment validation, gateway health checks, and retry logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useAssetHealth.ts: Performs a delayed health check against the asset canister’s /health endpoint and returns its status.
frontend/src/hooks/useAssetUpload.ts: Provides a GLB file upload function using Plug wallet authentication and the asset canister’s uploadLandModel method.
frontend/src/hooks/useGovernanceActor.ts: Initializes the governance canister actor with Internet Identity, gateway failover, and retry-based initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook for login, identity loading, and auth state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useMarketplaceActor.t: Initializes the marketplace canister actor with identity support, gateway failover, and retry logic.
Provides generic and specific Plug Wallet mutation hooks for token, marketplace, and governance canisters with query invalidation and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching land data, user profiles, token balances, and performing related mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useTokenActor.ts: Initializes and retries creation of a token canister actor with gateway failover, timeout handling, and Internet Identity integration.
frontend/src/index.css: Global styles including Tailwind setup, dark theme variables, neon/glass effects, and custom fonts.
frontend/src/lib/buildInfo.ts: Exports build metadata and utilities for cache busting and logging build information.
frontend/src/lib/debugConfig.ts: Provides debug utilities for 3D rendering, GPU diagnostics, performance logging, and renderer conflict detection.
frontend/src/lib/modelLoader.ts: Empty or placeholder file for future model-loading functionality.
frontend/src/lib/tokenUtils.ts: Provides helper functions to format and parse ICRC‑1 token amounts and add separators, with defaults for an 8‑decimal CBR token.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with react‑query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/marketplace-backend.d.ts: Contains TypeScript types for the marketplace canister, including listings, item types, and buy/list operations.
frontend/src/marketplace-backend.idl.ts: Defines the Candid IDL for the marketplace canister, including item types, listings, and service methods.
frontend/src/pages/Collection.tsx: Renders the modifier collection catalog with tier counts, styling helpers, and a grid display.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard page that loads land data, manages tab navigation, and displays various game modules.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page enabling Internet Identity login with animated UI and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/MintingPage.tsx: Shows loading state for land initialization and confirms successful minting before redirecting.
frontend/src/pages/VerificationPage.tsx: Displays a canister‑ID verification tool with background visuals and a link back home.
frontend/src/token-backend.d.ts: TypeScript definitions for the token canister, including accounts, transfers, metadata, and admin controls.
frontend/src/token-backend.idl.ts: Defines the IDL factory for token-related canister methods including balance, transfer, metadata, supply, and mint.
frontend/src/types/webgpu.d.ts: Provides TypeScript type declarations for the WebGPU API to enable compile-time support and feature detection.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, animations, plugins, and extended theme settings for the frontend.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Sets up Vite with React, environment variables, build timestamping, asset handling fixes, and dev server configuration.
project_state.json: Captures project state, required visual calibration changes, and tracked feature requests for rendering adjustments.
README_RUSSIAN.md: Russian‑language deployment overview with prerequisites and quick‑start steps for CyberGenesis.
scripts/upload_assets_mainnet.sh: Bash script that uploads .glb model assets to an ICP mainnet asset canister with validation, rate limiting, and post‑upload verification.
scripts/upload_assets.sh: Bash script that batch-uploads tiered 3D model assets to the AssetCanister via dfx, with verification and logging.
unknown.txt: Contains a brief instruction referencing testing a health endpoint.
